home.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Main)

home-wide.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Main Wide Layout)

home-boxed.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Main Boxed Layout)

perfumes-home.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Perfumes)

electronics-home.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Electronics)

lingerie-home.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Lingerie)

jewerly-home.name: Compo - Responsive & Retina Ready Magento theme (Jewerly)

product_hover_image.title: Effect Type
product_hover_image.note: Choose effect for appearing hover images. Refer to the theme documentation before enabling this option

retina_product_images.title: Use Retina
retina_product_images.note: Enabling of this option will make your images look sharp on devices that have a retina displays instead of blurry due to the higher pixel ratio of the devices display. Refer to to the theme documentation before enabling this option

aspect_ratio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspect_ratio.note:
As Is means all of your images will be displayed as is without any transformation. The width is set in .phtml templates, the height is calculated automatically
Keep The Same Height the best option if your images have different proportions, in that case all of them will have the same height but with keeping correct aspect ratio (spaces will be added if required)
Width x Height - there are a few predefined aspect ratios you can choose from the list

custom_aspect_ratio_height.title: Set your own value of height ratio to width...

custom_grid_img_width.title: Define image size for grid view

custom_list_img_width.title: Define image size for list view

lightbox_status.title: Status
lightbox_status.note: This option allows to open full size popup with product image. You can activate it for product images on product listing page and/or on product pages

timer_status.title: Price countdown:
timer_status.note: Activate Price Countdown Timer. Make sure that sale date is set in field "Special Price From Date" on product edit page in section Prices.

timer_listing_status.title: Timer on listing status
timer_listing_status.note: Timer will be disaplyed on category page

timer_listing_title.title: Timer on listing title
timer_listing_title.note: Will be shown above countdown timer

timer_listing_display.title: Timer on listing display options
timer_listing_display.note: Choose if you want to show full format or just hours, minutes and seconds on product page

timer_product_status.title: Timer on product status
timer_product_status.note: Timer will be disaplyed on category page

timer_product_title.title: Timer on product title
timer_product_title.note: Will be shown above countdown timer

timer_product_display.title: Timer on product display options
timer_product_display.note: Choose if you want to show full format or just hours, minutes and seconds on product page

product_label_new.title: Label "New"
product_label_new.note: Make sure that you have products marked as new in field "Set Product as New from Date" on product edit page

product_label_sale.title: Label "On Sale"
product_label_sale.note: Make sure that you have products marked as products with special price. To change special price navigate to Catalog -> Manage products -> Product edit page -> Prices vertical tab

product_label_only_xleft.title: Label "Only X left
product_label_only_xleft.note: Will be shown instead of "On sale" label. Refer to the theme documentation to know how to configure magento settings in order to display that label

product_label_sale_percentage.title: Show Sale Percentage
product_label_sale_percentage.note: Pecentage will be shown if the value set in Product Special Price field on product edit page is differ than value set in Product Price field

google_contact_map.title: Map
google_contact_map.note: By default it is showing on Contact us page

google_api.title: Google Maps API
google_api.note: Please enter API Key. More information: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/get-api-key

google_details_block_status.title: Details block status
google_details_block_status.note: Will show block with detailed information over the Google map

google_static_block_for_details.title: Static Block for Details
google_static_block_for_details.note: Choose static block with detailed information which will be shown over Google map

google_details_block_width.title: Details Block Width
google_details_block_width.note: Please specify block width in pixels

google_details_block_height.title: Details Block Height
google_details_block_height.note: Please specify block height in pixels

google_details_block_position.title: Details Block Position
google_details_block_position.note: Please set one of four available details block position over the Gmap

popup_delay.title: Delay before popup opens, sec
popup_delay.note: Set delay time in seconds after which popup window will appears. If set 0, then popup will appear right after website is loaded.

popup_expires.title: Popup expires end
popup_expires.note: Set period in days after which popup will be shown again if customer has already subscribed or chosen option "Don't show this popup again". Set from 1 to infinite.

popup_onlyhome.title: Show only on the homepage
popup_onlyhome.note: If set yes, popup will be shown only on home page.

totop_button.title: To top Button
totop_button.note: This "Back to top" link allows users to smoothly scroll back to the top of the page

v2.name: Disabled. Site width will be set as 1024px

v3.name: Disabled. Site width will be set as 1280px

container_width.title: Container Width
container_width.note: Specify value in pixels, do not add "px" suffix

cartlayout.title: My cart page
cartlayout.note: Choose one of 3 cart page layouts

breadcrumbs_type.title: Breadcrumbs Type
breadcrumbs_type.note: Default background type is layout with breadcrumbs located under header. Custom breabcrumbs are breadcrumbs with image and left-aligned page title. Custom 2 breadcrumbs are breadcrumbs with image and centered page title. To upload image choose either custom or custom 2 breadcrumbs.

breadcrumbs_bgimage.title: Upload your breabcrumbs backgorund image
breadcrumbs_bgimage.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on home page and all other pages if second logo is not loaded

header_wrapper_bgimage.title: Upload your header backgorund image
header_wrapper_bgimage.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on home page and all other pages if second logo is not loaded

header_sticky.title: Sticky
header_sticky.note: Will be displayed on devices up to 767px

logo.title: Upload your logo
logo.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on home page and all other pages if second logo is not loaded

logo_X2.title: Upload your retina logo
logo_X2.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on home page and all other pages if second logo is not loaded

second_logo.title: Second Logo
second_logo.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on all pages except home page

second_logo_X2.title: Second Retina Logo
second_logo_X2.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on all pages except home page

small_logo.title: Small Logo
small_logo.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on sticky header

small_logo_X2.title: Small Retina Logo
small_logo_X2.note:
JPG,GIF,PNG
This logo is shown on sticky header

topcart_hover.title: Open cart on hover
topcart_hover.note: Hover cart will work only on desktop. Default "On click" top cart will work on mobile devices.

custom_footer.title: Footer
custom_footer.note: If custom footer is chosen make sure that static which will be responsible for the footer is active and assigned to appropriate store.

listing_columns.title: Number of columns in grid view

listing_desc.title: Short description
listing_desc.note: Enable or disable short description. Make sure that product short description is filled with product information on product edit page

listing_indents.title: Space around product thumbnail
listing_indents.note: This option will remove spaces around product thumbnails. Your product images must be the same height, otherwise for the small product images white space will be added automatically

listing_rating_stars.title: Rating Stars
listing_rating_stars.note: Enable or disable Rating Stars. Make sure that ratings are enabled and configured in Catalog -> Reviews and Ratings -> Manage Ratings

listing_rating_customer.title: Rating Customer Link
listing_rating_customer.note: Enable or disable Rating Stars. Make sure that ratings are enabled and configured in Catalog -> Reviews and Ratings -> Manage Ratings

listing_rating_review.title: "Add your review" link
listing_rating_review.note: Enable or disable "Add your review" link. Make sure that ratings are enabled and configured in Catalog -> Reviews and Ratings -> Manage Ratings

listing_stock.title: Stock status
listing_stock.note: Enable or disable product stock status icon

listing_cart_btn.title: Button "Add to cart"
listing_cart_btn.note: Enable or disable Button "Add to cart"

language_label.title: Language label
language_label.note: Will appear only if you have several stores with different langages

currency_switcher.note: Will appear only if you have several active currencies
currency_switcher.title: Status

prev_next_buttons.title: Prev and Next product buttons
prev_next_buttons.note: Buttons allow you to move between products within a category just in one click. Here you can also change layout of those buttons

product_sku.title: Product SKU
product_sku.note: Will be displayed under product title

more_views.title: More Views Type
more_views.note: Slider option will work if product has 4+ images

product_shop_col_xs_size.title: Product Page layout
product_shop_col_xs_size.note: Allows to choose layout for product page. Layouts has different ratio of product image and product content.

product_sidebar_position.title: Custom Sidebar
product_sidebar_position.note: Custom sidebar will be displayed only on 1- and 2-column design of product page.

product_compare.title: Compare products block
product_compare.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

product_related.title: Related Products position
product_related.note: Choose location where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. If you set to show related products in bottom position they will be shown after product tabs on product page. You must have related products assigned to the product on product edit page, otherwise that block will show nothing

related_products.title: Related Products display mode
related_products.note: You can display your related products block as slider or simple list. Make sure that you have more than 2 related products if you choose slider value

product_poll.title: Polls block
product_poll.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. Make sure that you have at least 1 enabled poll (CMS -> Polls)

product_tags.title: Product tags block
product_tags.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. Make sure that you have at least 1 product tag.

product_viewed.title: Viewed Products block
product_viewed.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. Products in this block will be displayed only if customer have already visited some other product page

product_subscribe.title: Newsletter subscribe block
product_subscribe.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

product_wishlist.title: Wishlist block
product_wishlist.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

product_wishlist_type.title: Wishlist Display mode
product_wishlist_type.note: Here you can choose one of two avalable display mode of wishlist block

product_facebook.title: Facebook block
product_facebook.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that you have enabled custom sidebar if you choose to display block in custom sidebar and make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. To enable facebook like box navigate to Meigee -> Theme manager -> Theme edit page -> Sidebar -> Facebook Like Box Block

product_collateral.title: Collateral block
product_collateral.note: You can set 1 of 4 available collateral block layouts

product_collateral_pos.title: Collateral block position
product_collateral_pos.note: On some of layouts of product page it isn't recommended to put collateral into details block due to limited space

product_upsell_pos.title: Upsell products blocks position
product_upsell_pos.note: Make suree that upsell products has been assigned to products

additional_content_under_product_descrip.title: Under product description
additional_content_under_product_descrip.note: These static blocks will be displayed one below the other. By default static block with social icons code is displaying under product description

additional_content_product_tabs_static_b.title: Products Tabs
additional_content_product_tabs_static_b.note: You can add any static block as your custom product tab. Title of that static block will be used as product tab title

additional_content_related_static_blocks.title: "Related" static block
additional_content_related_static_blocks.note: Will replace related products block ot its position

snippets_status.title: Status
snippets_status.note: Adds rich data-markup to your product pages so search engines will show richer item preview with information about price, reviews and breadcrumbs

snippets_breadcrumbs.title: Breadcrumbs
snippets_breadcrumbs.note: Will show paths to your product pages on search pages of search engines

snippets_reviews.title: Reviews and Ratings
snippets_reviews.note: Will show reviews and ratings on search pages of search engines

snippets_price.title: Price
snippets_price.note: Will show price on search pages of search engines

snippets_availability.title: Availability
snippets_availability.note: Will show availability on search pages of search engines

block_shopby.title: Shop By Block
block_shopby.note: Categories must be anchored (Catalog -> Manage Categories -> Category edit page -> Design tab) to display that block

block_compare.title: Compare products block
block_compare.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

block_viewed.title: Viewed Products block
block_viewed.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. Products in this block will be displayed only if customer have already visited some other product page

block_tag.title: Product tags block
block_tag.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar. Make sure that you have at least 1 product tag.

block_subscribe.title: Newsletter subscribe block
block_subscribe.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

block_wishlist.title: Wishlist block
block_wishlist.note: Choose sideabar column where this block will be displayed. Make sure that product page layout set as 2- or 3-columns design if you choose to show this block in left or right sidebar

bgslider_status.title: Status
bgslider_status.note: Will be shown only if boxed layout is chosen
